description:
GETS to v1.0/images/<id> or v1.1/images/<id> return incorrect progress information.

At the very least ACTIVE images should have progress set to 100.

Images marked as saving have their progress continually set to 0. It would be nice to update progress when loading (saving) an image as well.
title: image 'progress' is incorrect

comments.content:
GETS to v1.0/images/<id> or v1.1/images/<id> return incorrect progress information.

At the very least ACTIVE images should have progress set to 100.

Images marked as saving have their progress continually set to 0. It would be nice to update progress when loading (saving) an image as well.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince
